overview: The story of the famed revolutionary activist and author, assassinated while in his prime in his native Guyana in 1980, is told through interviews with Rodneyâ€™s contemporaries. Author of the study How Europe Underdeveloped Africa, Rodney committed his life to the development of a movement that sought emancipation and black solidarity across borders.
title: W.A.R. Stories: Walter Anthony Rodney
